name: Omnisend for Paid Memberships Pro Add-On
author: Omnisend

sections.description:
Omnisend for Paid Memberships Pro – automatically sync contacts, new subscribers & their membership levels to Omnisend. Paid Memberships Pro gives you all the tools you need to start, manage, and grow your membership site. The plugin is designed for premium content sites, clubs/associations, subscription products, newsletters, and more.

REQUIREMENTS

Omnisend for Paid Memberships Pro add-on requires you to install:
– Paid Memberships Pro plugin
– Omnisend plugin
sections.faq:
What are the technical requirements for the plugin installation?

  • PHP 7.4+
  • WordPress 4.0.1+
  • Omnisend account

How can I reach Omnisend support?

Every Omnisend customer gets our award-winning support, 24/7â€”even on the free plan. Email support@omnisend.com or use the live chat option within your account. We also have a comprehensive Knowledge Base.

Where can I find Omnisend Terms?

Read Omnisend Terms of Use

Where can I find Omnisend Privacy Policy?

Read Omnisend Terms of Use

How can I report security bugs?

You can report security bugs through the Patchstack Vulnerability Disclosure Program. The Patchstack team help validate, triage and handle any security vulnerabilities. Report a security vulnerability.

screenshots.caption: Build beautiful campaigns using our email templates
Drive revenue round the clock and recover sales with pre-built automated workflows
Access all features on the generous free-forever plan
Grow your audience with popups incl exit-intent, signup forms & spin-to-win
Fast support, available 24/77. Actionable insights to help create more personalized messages
Convert more visitors with highly-targeted landing pages
